body.name: Homall Gaming Chair, Computer Chair with Footrest and Massage Lumbar Support, Ergonomic High Back Video Game Chair with Swivel Seat and Headrest (White)

climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: Excellent Comfort: This computer gaming chair features headrest and massage lumbar pillow. When your neck gets sore from long hours working or gaming, the headrest can help ease the pain. When your waist feels achy from sitting in a same position, open the massage function of the lumbar support and let it relieve your fatigue.

High Quality: The white gaming chair, designed with ergonomic construction, featuring a BIFMA-certified metal base, is more sturdy and durable. Class 3 gas lift and upgraded mechanism improve the safety performance. Skin friendly PU leather and high density foam increase the comfort of seat. Weight capacity: 270lbs.

Multi Function: Our gaming chair with footrest aims at liberating your feet. You can just take out footrest and put your feet up with your favorite music on. 360 degree swivel and smooth caster wheels can offer you any directions you like. 90°-135° reclining is suitable for working, reading, gaming or napping. Height adjustment function is also included.

Perfect for Gamer: We are dedicated to create the comfortable and quality game chairs for pro gamers. And with stylish look and ergonomic design, this big and tall gaming chair is a fabulous choice for adults and kids. It is aslo suitable for your living room, bedroom, gaming room or office. Choose Homall to improve your gaming experience and enjoy fun.

Assembly & Service: All parts are marked with either a letter or a number, and the instructions show exactly which parts should be used. You just need to follow the steps to install the massage gaming chair, it won’t take much of your time. Homall has an excellent after-sale service team, please feel free to contact us if you have any questions, we will do our best to help you solve the problems you have.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: VERSATILE Homall is committed to providing customers with a delightful shopping experience, so that customers can buy satisfactory furniture at affordable prices. As a seller in the furniture industry for many years,we are always trying our best to improve and innovate products that combine beauty, functionality and durability. At Homall, you can purchase the suitable furniture to decorate your sweet home and make your life with full of happiness. This Homall video game chair is made of high quality PU leather, BIFMA certified metal base, gas lift and thick seat. Give your gaming a comfortable and excellent experience with these ergonomics chairs. MULTI FUNCTION 90°-135° reclinable, 360° swivel and height adjustable meet all gamer need. EXTRA COMFORT Headrest, massage lumbar pillow and thick cushion relax your neck and ease your waist pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stop looking and buy this one.
reviews.reviewText: Took around 30 minutes to assemble Simple instructions, easy to follow. This does incorporate an optional vibrating cushion, which needs to be attached via USB if you choose to use it. The cable is a 2-part cable, so if you forget it's plugged in and go to roll away, it should release rather than ripping your entire set up off the desk. (I know this from experience, lol) But, if you're using this for console gaming, the cable is not much longer than maybe 4', so it wouldn't be an ideal option for gaming at a far distance from the system being used, unless you've got another power source.Super comfy, I am 350 pounds on a good day, and while this does feel slightly tight, it's a good kind of tight. It's like a firm hug on my back.The fold out foot stool underneath is one of those tacky things that you'd never use if you're using this chair in an executive setting UNLESS you're anything like myself. I have ADHD, ADD and GAD (Generalized Anxiety Disorder)- needless to say, I fidget constantly. This chair is the perfect companion, I can re-adjust it time and time again and feel as thought I've changed how I'm sitting, which is extremely important to me and may be important to you! :) So if you're like me, just quit the search... I'm serious, I've gone through chairs from $700 + and have never been more satisfied with what I've spent than this one. Maybe a fluke, and of course if something changes I'll come back and update this review, but so far- I cannot express how happy I am with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was a gift, and although it took a little bit to put together, which wasn’t too bad. It’s a really nice chair. My son is going to enjoy this for years to come. Very sturdy. The only thing he complained about was the speakers. They are kind of bulky in the back. But other than that, she really likes the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Thin layer of cushion.
reviews.reviewText: Chair is a good chair. I like the features it comes with and the price was fair. I’ve had it for about 3 months now and I’ve had to retighten the screws a couple times but that’s it. I bought the chair as i was having pain in my left leg from my old chair. The pain actually subsided a little but 3 months in, the chair is starting to become thin. I bought it as every gamer i know spends some solid time i. Their chair and comfort is key, well yes it’s true to a degree.1 star for design1 star for build1 star for the materials1 star for the features0 for comfort.I’m a 190lb guy who uses this chair for work daily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Gift for your perfect gamer
reviews.reviewText: We got this for our 15 year old for his birthday. He had the flu and this lifted his spirits so much! The quality is awesome and it also has a massaging back piece.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Chair is ok. I bought it for work. It’s got some nice features but is not great quality. The seat cushion is already wearing where it’s uncomfortable. I already ordered a seat pad for it because it’s only been a month and it hurts my butt now I guess for the money it’s what you would get. Next chair, I may just lay out the money for like a secret lab chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Pretty easy to put together and seems to be good quality material.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It’s more comfortable with a blanket over it and then a blanket on you and add pillows. Nice product the massager is nice too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Believe The Reviews That Warn You Not To Buy
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Putting this chair together is horrible! I had to drill out one of the holes to put the chair rollers in. It didn't fit. Then I had to do the same to one of the screw holes for the back of the chair where you attach it to the chair bottom. Then, there is the left chair arm where it attaches to the back of the chair. Keep the hex screw handy, because you need it almost every other day when the arm loosens up. The foot stool piece is loose and not long enough to use comfortably. I am 5'1 and my feet dangle off. Last, but not least, the seat. It said memory foam, it must be the most uncomfortable chair seat I've ever sat upon. I have to sit at my desk eight or more hours a day working from home and by the end of the first hour it makes me ache all over from the seat up. I wish I had kept the 10 year old office chair that I threw away. If so, I would have returned this one for a refund. DO NOT RECOMMENDED!!!
